documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: May 18, 2020

Flask LLP ("us", "we", or "our") operates the Zones iOS/watchOS application ("this app").

By using this app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

1. Information Collection And Use 1-1. Health Data

We will use Apple's APIs to read and/or write certain data to the Apple Health app on your device (the “Health Data”). Such information may include, for example:

  • Workouts
  • Heart Rate
  • Distance
  • Active Energy

We will use your Health Data to show you the workout details and judge the heart rate zones.

We will not use your Health Data for marketing or advertising purposes. Your Health Data will be accessed locally through the Apple Health and will not be stored or cached by the app. Your Health Data will not be sent to our server. This app cannot read from or write to the Apple Health without your consent.

1-2. Location Data

This app will start to collect location data from sources such as GPS, Wi-Fi and cell towers once you install the App and consent to the App’s tracking your location (the “Location Data”).

We will use your Location Data to show you the route map of your workout.

We will not use your Location Data for marketing or advertising purposes. Your Location Data is stored locally and not be sent to our server. This app cannot read your location without your consent. You can adjust your mobile device settings by following the instructions here.

2. Security

The security of your information is important to us, but remember that no method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

3. Changes To This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

We will not change this agreement to allow the collection of your personal information or make other significant changes without your consent.

4. Disclaimers

We make no guarantees as to the suitability of this app for the user, or for any of its functionality, product price, accuracy, or usefulness, and will not be held responsible in the event that damage is incurred.

We reserve the right to change this app or to stop offering it. This company will not be held responsible if this app is discontinued, changed, or otherwise made unusable and data is damaged or lost as a result, or if the device itself is damaged, or if the device incurred damage due to another app.

5. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

Flask LLP
support@flaskapp.com
